授業方法:
HyFlex (Hybrid Flexible) session. In this individual guidance-based course, students are expected to participate the first session so that we can discuss the format and contents for this course.
Please refer to LUNA 3 days before the first session, check class announcements and review a more detailed version of syllabus.

トピック.授業外学習2: Please refer to LUNA regularly, check class announcements and review your learning materials as instructed. Students will be expected to read and write extensively and to prepare thoroughly for each session with academic integrity.
